encryption.viewPassword=Display the password encryption.editPassword=Edit encryption.hidePassword=Hide encryption.setPassword=Set the password encryption.manageRights=Manage decryption rights encryption.editModeMessage=Go back to view mode to edit this field
encryption.denied=You are not allowed to decrypt this password.
encryption.macroDescription=Encrypt your sensitive data encryption.parameterDescription=Give a name to this field
encryption.administration.message=From this page you can handle the rights for the different encrypted fields of this wiki. encryption.administration.wiki=Choose who can see encrypted fields on the whole wiki encryption.administration.space=Choose who can see encrypted fields on this space encryption.administration.page=Choose who can see encrypted fields on this page encryption.administration.listPages=Here is the list of the pages of the space //{0}// containing encrypted field. To give decryption rights on only one of these pages click on the corresponding link. encryption.administration.spaceAuthorized=Choose who can decrypt protected field in the space //{0}// : encryption.administration.pageAuthorized=Choose who can decrypt protected field in the page //{0}// : encryption.administration.backToPage=Go back to this page
